Title: Software Consultant
Description: Fast is a software consulting company that builds commercial of the shelf software for state governments. Since being hired, I’ve been assigned to a production support team for one of their DMV installments. Our team develops production enhancements and fixes to improve the application's performance.

Title: Web Development Intern
Description: I spent this summer working for my school's church engagement program. I was tasked with building a web application for a local church. This application allowed for church members to volunteer for various activities and events, which improved the efficiency of the congregation’s volunteering process.

Title: Teaching Assistant
Description: Taught students fundamentals of front end web development and assisted in debugging/problem solving.
